boardgame.description: Two to seven players, ages 8 and up try to obtain fried worms for their chickens, so that they don't go hungry. Of course, anyone who doesn't manage to grab a worm off of the grill can help himself to those of his opponents. This fast-paced game by Reiner Knizia is, like Hick Hack im Gackelwack, a gambling game in the finest chicken tradition._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn players roll their dice and set aside all those matching any single value. The remaining dice are rolled and any value is set aside again until the player stops and takes a tile or busts and puts their last tile back. When a player busts and fails to take a tile they must also turn the highest tile face-down._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Interestingly, the German edition from Zoch has English rules in the box._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Dutch edition is part of the Jakkie _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bak Collection_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The German edition is part of The Chicken Family of Zoch._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be received within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.5% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games customerservice@chumchumgames.com

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: Check item description and request any additional information to verify condition or age, before placing your bid. The item_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s description is based on my opinion and is described to the best of my ability. All dates and ages of items listed are approximate to the best of my knowledge. All items are sold as is and all sales are considered final. By bidding on this item you are agreeing to the above mentioned terms and conditions. Used items are sold as is, so please read description carefully and ask any questions before buying. PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 7 days of the end of the auction. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: Preferred payment is PayPal, but will accept cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks or money orders. I DO NOT accept personal checks. If you choose to pay by cashier check or money order, please include item number. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

Rio Grande Games (RIO 271) Type: Set collecting Number of players: 2-6 Age of players: 8+ Length: 20 minutes Game Description: Roasted worms are a bird’s delight. On one hand this is due to the fact that worms are the favourite dish of all poultry. On the other hand, the preference for barbecue worms is nobody else’s doing but of Johnny Rooster Roaster. His Uncle Sam, a native from Chickentown Kentucky, had the idea to open up a worm roasting house at each corner of town. Johnny didn’t hesitate to make this idea a reality and since their first days as worm-barbecue masters their roasting joints have found no lack of eager and famished customers. And the customers keep coming. All over the place, chicken folk have started to gather worms and supply them to Johnny. Whether Curry Worm, Roast’n Worm or Frankfurter Worm: poultry of all sorts are standing in line to taste one of these specialties. For Johnny and his new found business the following stands: from worm hunter to millionaire! Author: Reiner Knizia

This is the cutest Knizia game out there! This is the Dutch version of Pickomino from 999 Games Edition that comes in a little tin, with little dice, and little tiles. The rules are in Dutch, but it should be easy enough to download the English (or whatever language version).
played once.

Heckmeck is a brilliantly simple yet fiendish game. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s played with chunky tiles – not unlike Mah Jongg or Dominoes – that players collect according to what they can roll on the dice. Unless they go bust and lose a tile! I have the multi-lingual edition from the German publisher. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £8.33 (net of UK tax - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country). I charge shipping at cost and I can offer several options (or ask me to get a quote from couriers). To UK addresses: myHermes (2-3 working days, tracked) £2.98 Second class post (2-3 working days) £3.36 First class post (1 working day) £6.85 To other EU countries: Air mail (1 week or so) £8.22 Outside the EU: Air mail in Europe (1 week or so) £6.85 Air mail (about 1 week, no tracking) £11.15 (Australasia)/£10.30 (USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere) Surface mail (up to 8 weeks, no tracking) £6.65
